long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Holder is an effective tool to manage and organize tabs. This extension provides the ability to store multiple open tabs and recall them when needed. 

Tab Holder is useful for temporarily saving tabs that you are currently working on or need to reopen soon. 

Unlike bookmarks, tabs are automatically removed from the list once you remove them, which is perfect for saving tabs to be viewed later.

Ctrl+Q to queue current tab, and Ctrl+I to pop tab from queue.
Use the dropdown menu to select different queues.
In incognito mode, click the secret toggle button to mark a queue as secret.

For more information, refer to the info button in the app.
